body_html:
hey alex, I've also tried reproducing it on a nightly, but couldnt.

I see one red flag in your PyTorch install. You have both 0.4.1 and 1.0 installed. See lines:

[conda] pytorch 0.4.1 py37_cuda9.2.148_cudnn7.1.4_1 [cuda92] pytorch
[conda] pytorch-nightly 1.0.0.dev20181105 py3.7_cuda9.2.148_cudnn7.1.4_0 [cuda92] pytorch

Can you try this:

conda uninstall -y pytorch pytorch-nightly torchvision
pip uninstall -y torch
pip uninstall -y torch

pip install torchvision_nightly
conda install -y pytorch-nightly

body:
hey alex, I've also tried reproducing it on a nightly, but couldnt.

I see one red flag in your PyTorch install. You have both `0.4.1` and `1.0` installed. See lines:

```
[conda] pytorch 0.4.1 py37_cuda9.2.148_cudnn7.1.4_1 [cuda92] pytorch
[conda] pytorch-nightly 1.0.0.dev20181105 py3.7_cuda9.2.148_cudnn7.1.4_0 [cuda92] pytorch
```

Can you try this:

```
conda uninstall -y pytorch pytorch-nightly torchvision
pip uninstall -y torch
pip uninstall -y torch

pip install torchvision_nightly
conda install -y pytorch-nightly
```
